briefdescription.para: PPI channels.
PPI channel groups.
Definition of whether a PPI channel belongs to a group.
Definition of whether a PPI channel is enabled.
PPI tasks.
Function for enabling a given PPI channel.

detaileddescription.para: This function enables only one channel.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Channel to be enabled.

briefdescription.para: Function for disabling a given PPI channel.

detaileddescription.para: This function disables only one channel.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Channel to be disabled.

briefdescription.para: Function for checking if a given PPI channel is enabled.

detaileddescription.para: This function checks only one channel.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Channel to be checked.
The channel is enabled.
The channel is not enabled.

briefdescription.para: Function for disabling all PPI channels.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

briefdescription.para: Function for enabling multiple PPI channels.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Channel mask.

briefdescription.para: Function for disabling multiple PPI channels.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Channel mask.

briefdescription.para: Function for setting up event and task endpoints for a given PPI channel.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Event register address.
Task register address.
Channel to which the given endpoints are assigned.

briefdescription.para: Function for setting up the event endpoint for a given PPI channel.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Event register address.
Channel to which the given endpoint is assigned.

briefdescription.para: Function for setting up the task endpoint for a given PPI channel.

Channel to which the given endpoint is assigned.

briefdescription.para: Function for setting up event and task endpoints for a given PPI channel and fork.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Event register address.
Task register address.
Fork task register address (register value).
Channel to which the given endpoints are assigned.

briefdescription.para: Function for including a PPI channel in a channel group.

detaileddescription.para: This function adds only one channel to the group.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Channel to be included in the group.
Channel group.

briefdescription.para: Function for setting multiple PPI channels in a channel group.

detaileddescription.para: This function adds all specified channels to the group.

simplesect.para: All channels included previously will be overwritten.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Channels to be assgined in the group.
Channel group.

briefdescription.para: Function for including multiple PPI channels in a channel group.

detaileddescription.para: This function adds all specified channels to the group.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Channels to be included in the group.
Channel group.

briefdescription.para: Function for removing a PPI channel from a channel group.

detaileddescription.para: This function removes only one channel from the group.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Channel to be removed from the group.
Channel group.

briefdescription.para: Function for removing multiple PPI channels from a channel group.

detaileddescription.para: This function removes all specified channels from the group.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Channels to be removed from the group.
Channel group.

briefdescription.para: Function for removing all PPI channels from a channel group.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Channel group.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

briefdescription.para: Function for disabling a channel group.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting the PPI enable task address of the specified group.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting the PPI disable task address of the specified group.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting the DISABLE task associated with the specified channel group.

briefdescription.para: Hardware access layer (HAL) for managing the Programmable Peripheral Interconnect (PPI) channels.
